Bold.Sequence.Description: Sequence used for functional MRI acquisition

Age.Description: Participant age in years at the time of scan/intake

EHQ_Total.Description: Handedness index from -100 (fully left-handed) to +100 (fully right-handed)

Commercial_Use.Description: Whether the participant consented to commercial use of data

Levels.No: Consent for commercial use not granted

Full_Pheno.Description: Indicates whether the participant has a complete phenotypic dataset

Levels.No: Full phenotypic dataset is not available

site.Description: Imaging site where participant was scanned
